hero.title: Connect Farmers and Vendors for Bulk Produce
hero.subtitle: United Farms is a digital marketplace that connects farmers directly with vendors for bulk transactions of fresh produce at fair prices.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our platform makes bulk produce trading simple, transparent, and fair for both farmers and vendors.

farmers.title: For Farmers
farmers.description: List your produce and set your own prices. Get direct access to bulk buyers.
farmers.point1: Register and verify your farming license
farmers.point2: List your produce with prices and available quantities
farmers.point3: Respond to offers and complete transactions

marketplace.title: Transparent Marketplace
marketplace.description: A central hub where pricing is transparent and negotiations are smooth.
marketplace.point2: Historical price trends for informed decisions
marketplace.point3: Secure transaction process with fair commission

vendors.title: For Vendors
vendors.description: Source quality produce in bulk directly from farmers with transparent pricing.
vendors.point1: Browse produce listings with detailed information
vendors.point2: Place bulk orders with price negotiation

dailyPrice.title: Daily Price Updates
dailyPrice.description: Farmers update their produce prices daily, ensuring you always have the latest market rates.

priceHistory.title: Price Trend Analytics
priceHistory.description: View historical price data with visual charts to make informed buying and selling decisions.

bulkOrders.title: Bulk Order System
bulkOrders.description: Place and manage large orders efficiently with minimum quantity requirements of 200kg+.

negotiations.title: Price Negotiation
negotiations.description: Negotiate prices directly on the platform with up to three rounds of counter-offers.

reviews.title: Rating System
reviews.description: Build trust through our two-way rating system between farmers and vendors.

security.title: Secure Transactions
security.description: Our platform ensures privacy and security with just a 5% commission on completed orders.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from the farmers and vendors who use our platform daily.

farmer1.quote: United Farms has transformed my business. I now sell directly to multiple vendors and get fair prices for my produce.
farmer1.name: Rajesh Patel

vendor1.quote: The platform helps me source quality produce at competitive prices. The price negotiation feature is especially useful.
vendor1.name: Priya Sharma

farmer2.quote: I love the price trend analytics. It helps me decide when to plant certain crops for maximum profitability.
farmer2.name: Sanjay Verma

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Agri-Business?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers and vendors who are already benefiting from our platform.
